model.name: Web4CLI Usage Sections Standardization
model.title: Web4CLI Usage Sections Standardization
model.description: All Web4Articles CLI tools must implement identical usage section structure: Usage, Commands, Parameters, Examples. This ensures consistent user experience and documentation patterns across the entire Web4 ecosystem. Each CLI must follow the exact same sectional layout as requirement-v0.1.2.2 for professional consistency and predictable user interaction patterns.
